1.name: Jurassic Park
1.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

2.name: Tombstone
2.description: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

3.name: Schindler's List
3.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

4.name: Dazed and Confused
4.description: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

5.name: The Sandlot
5.description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

6.name: True Romance
6.description: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

7.name: The Fugitive
7.description: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

8.name: Addams Family Values
8.description: The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.

9.name: Mrs. Doubtfire
9.description: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

10.name: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
10.description: After his father's death, Gilbert has to care for his mentally-disabled brother, Arnie, and his morbidly obese mother. This situation is suddenly challenged though, when love unexpectedly walks into his life.

11.name: Groundhog Day
11.description: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

12.name: Manhattan Murder Mystery
12.description: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.

13.name: Super Mario Bros.
13.description: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

14.name: Falling Down
14.description: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

15.name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
15.description: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

16.name: Carlito's Way
16.description: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

17.name: Son in Law
17.description: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

18.name: Last Action Hero
18.description: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

19.name: Indecent Proposal
19.description: A billionaire offers one million dollars to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

20.name: Philadelphia
20.description: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

21.name: Hocus Pocus
21.description: A curious youngster moves to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.

22.name: Blood In, Blood Out
22.description: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

23.name: Rookie of the Year
23.description: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

24.name: A Bronx Tale
24.description: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

25.name: The Firm
25.description: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

26.name: The Piano
26.description: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

27.name: The Three Musketeers
27.description: A 90s retelling of the classic story.

28.name: Kalifornia
28.description: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

29.name: The Pelican Brief
29.description: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

30.name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
30.description: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

31.name: Demolition Man
31.description: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

32.name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
32.description: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

33.name: Much Ado About Nothing
33.description: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

34.name: The Age of Innocence
34.description: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

35.name: Needful Things
35.description: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.

36.name: In the Name of the Father
36.description: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

37.name: Benny & Joon
37.description: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

38.name: Gettysburg
38.description: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

39.name: Cliffhanger
39.description: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

40.name: Sleepless in Seattle
40.description: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

41.name: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday
41.description: Serial killer Jason Voorhees' supernatural origins are revealed.

42.name: Hot Shots! Part Deux
42.description: "Rambo" parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.

43.name: A Perfect World
43.description: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor: an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search is headed up by an honorable Texas Ranger.

44.name: Sliver
44.description: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building, which she soon discovers houses tenants with all manner of shocking secrets.

45.name: The Remains of the Day
45.description: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

46.name: Naked
46.description: Parallel tales of two sexually obsessed men, one hurting and annoying women physically and mentally, one wandering around the city talking to strangers and experiencing dimensions of life.

47.name: The Vanishing
47.description: The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.

48.name: Menace II Society
48.description: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

49.name: Fire in the Sky
49.description: An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975.

50.name: In the Line of Fire
50.description: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.
